description: Mobiclip is a European software development company that was purchased by Nintendo in 2011. It has since been renamed to Nintendo European Research & Development (NERD).

Nintendo has used Mobiclip's proprietary video compression algorithm to compress videos used in many of their video games. Mobiclip-compressed videos included in Nintendo 3DS games are saved as MOFLEX files. For example, Monster Hunter 4 Ultimate and Mario Kart 7 for the 3DS includes MOFLEX videos.
